dmca.title: Small business alleges defamation
dmca.body:
It has come to my attention that you have engaged in a campaign to discredit and damage the Mobile Notary Public - [private] a company I recently started.    Negative comments regarding my person and my products and services not only acknowledged from yourself but from Real Estate firms in the Calavares and Alpine counties;   for example, in a recent posting dated as of February 24, 2008 from [private] stating you alleged I was tweeked all the time and a stalker.  Such comments may have the effect of damaging my Company's reputation and my Company's existing and prospective business relationships.  Pursuant to this letter, I demand that you cease and desist all such activity.

Unless you immediately cease and desist all such activities, I will have no choice but to take the appropriate legal steps to enforce and protect my rights including, without limitation, filing claims for unfair business practices under the laws of the State of California, and for trade libel and interference with my Company's business relationships. The remedies for such causes of action include injunctive relief and substantial monetary damages. 

Please immediately acknowledge your receipt of this letter and your intent to comply with the requests as set forth herein. 
Very truly yours,
